title: Journey into Mystery v1 (1996 - 1998)
description:
This torrent contains Marvel Comics&#039; Journey into Mystery v1 issues #503-521.

Journey into Mystery was an American comic book series published by Atlas Comics, and later its successor Marvel Comics. It featured horror, monster, and science fiction stories. With the start of the Silver Age of Comics, Marvel switched the feature to superhero stories and in issue #83 introduced Thor, inspired by the Norse thunder god and by writer Stan Lee&#039;s musings that comic books were the mythology of the modern day. Journey into Mystery primarily featured Thor stories through issue #125 and Journey into Mystery Annual #1, at which point the series was retitled The Mighty Thor.

As a consequence of Heroes Reborn, Thor dropped out of his own series beginning with issue #503 and his book&#039;s title was restored to Journey into Mystery. The series continued with the "Lost Gods" storyline (which ran through issue #513) and then with a rotating cast of characters,(Master of Kung-Fu, Hannibal King, Black Widow)until finally ending with Journey into Mystery #521 in 1998.

While the rest of the Thor issues of Journey into Mystery are available in various torrents out in the greater distrbution, these issues have been rare and hard to come by.

Thanks to the scanners, the various efforts at collecting the Marvel Comics Chronologies and to The Shiverman who was able to find the issues to complete this torrent.

Please seed. Please enjoy.
